description.value:
Wondrous item, uncommon
If you place 1 pound of honey inside this pot, the honey transforms into an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.xBhG7Dos3tkg9jWz]{ochre jelly} after 24 hours. The jelly remains in a dormant state within the pot until you dump it out. You can use an action to dump the jelly from the pot in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you. Once dumped, the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.xBhG7Dos3tkg9jWz]{ochre jelly} is hostile to all creatures, including you. Only one @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.xBhG7Dos3tkg9jWz]{ochre jelly} can occupy the pot at a time.
